pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, November 29, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Buenos Aires, Argentina

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will arrive in Buenos Aires.

Ministro Pistarini International Airport

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity of arrival

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Business Women Leaders Taskforce Forum panel discussion.

Room 614, 6th Floor
Kirchner Cultural Centre
Sarmiento 151

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

3:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Investors Forum concluding panel discussion.

Cupula Room, 9th Floor
Kirchner Cultural Centre
Sarmiento 151

Note for media:

    • Pooled coverage

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Role of Finance for Women’s Economic Empowerment Conference.

Contra Cupula Room, 9th Floor
Kirchner Cultural Centre
Sarmiento 151

Note for media:

    • Open coverage
